TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapDocumentMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Applying the to a method specifies that SOAP messages to and from the method use formatting.

span.span: Applying the to a method specifies that SOAP messages to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义了可以如何在 SOAP 消息中设置格式的 XML Web 服务方法，它将调用一个操作，两种风格：`RPC`和`Document`。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, which it calls an operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `Document` 是指根据 XSD 架构的 XML Web 服务方法格式设置。`Document` refers to formatting the XML Web service method according to an XSD schema. `Document`样式格式设置是指`Body`元素，作为一系列的一个或多个消息部分遵循`Body`元素。The `Document` style refers to formatting the `Body` element as a series of one or more message parts following the `Body` element. 各个消息部分的由精确和属性。Exactly how the individual message parts is determined by the and properties. 属性确定是否设置参数格式`Encoded`或`Literal`。The property determines whether parameters are formatted `Encoded` or `Literal`. 确定参数是否封装在单个消息部分以下`Body`元素或每个参数是否是一个单独的消息部分。The determines whether the parameters are encapsulated within a single message part following the `Body` element or whether each parameter is an individual message part. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅[自定义 SOAP 消息格式设置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). 此特性可以应用于 XML Web 服务方法在服务器上的和在客户端上的代理类的方法。This attribute can be applied to both an XML Web service method on the server and a method of the proxy class on the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将消息样式设置为`Document`为`GetUserName`XML Web 服务方法。The following code example sets the message style to `Document` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method. 此外，具有的 XML 元素`Body`元素的 SOAP 请求和 SOAP 响应设置为`GetUserNameRequest`和`GetUserNameResponse`分别。Additionally, the XML element with the `Body` element for the SOAP request and SOAP response are set to `GetUserNameRequest` and `GetUserNameResponse`, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 默认值是http://tempuri.org/MethodName，其中 MethodName 是 XML Web 服务方法的名称。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName, where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，属性是一个 URI，该值指示请求的意图。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the request. 但是，SOAP 规范的 uri 格式提出任何限制或所有规则的 URI 都是可解析。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format of the URI, or any rules about whether the URI is resolvable. 存在性和内容属性可以由 Web 服务器，例如防火墙，以相应地筛选在 HTTP SOAP 请求消息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers, such as firewalls, to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 1.1 版发布中的属性`soapAction`属性的`soap:operation`为每个元素在 XML Web 服务生成的 WSDL 文档中支持 SOAP 绑定。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) W3C 网站上的规范。For more information, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为`http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

span.span: Gets or sets the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: XML Web 服务方法实现操作的绑定。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: 默认值为"Soap"追加的 XML Web 服务的名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个绑定，定义的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)，是类似于一个接口，它定义一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 对于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services，每个 XML Web 服务方法是在绑定内的操作。With respect to XML Web services created using ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web 服务方法是 XML Web 服务的默认绑定或绑定中指定的成员应用于 XML Web 服务。XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. XML Web 服务可以实现多个绑定时多个特性应用于 XML Web 服务。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings when multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 一次一个或多个特性应用于 XML Web 服务或可应用于单个 XML Web 服务方法，以指示由特定的 XML Web 服务方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置的属性或以指定的绑定 XML Web 服务方法实现操作。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for. 只有一个或可以应用于 XML Web 服务方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，XML Web 服务方法只能实现一个绑定的操作。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. 有关 WSDL 规范的详细信息，请参阅[WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/)规范。For more information on the WSDL specification, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OneWay : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web 服务客户端不等待 Web 服务器完全处理 XML Web 服务方法。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web 服务方法具有属性设置为`true`，XML Web 服务客户端不需要等待 Web 服务器完成处理 XML Web 服务方法。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. Web 服务器已反序列化时，就立即，但在调用之前的 XML Web 服务方法，服务器返回 HTTP 202 状态代码。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before invoking the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 状态代码指示客户端 Web 服务器已开始处理消息。A HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，XML Web 服务客户端接收的 Web 服务器已成功处理该消息不发送任何确认。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 单向方法不能有返回值或任何输出参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. 如果您使用的具有的.NET Framework 1.0 版 XML Web 服务方法或特性应用于它们与属性设置为`true`，却可以访问其使用静态属性。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property of set to `true`, do not have access to their using the static property. 访问，派生类实现中的 XML Web 服务方法并访问属性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 XML Web 服务方法不需要客户端要等待的时间才能完成的 XML Web 服务方法。The following code example is an XML Web service method that does not require the client to wait for the XML Web service method to complete. 因此，此示例设置了属性设置为`true`。Therefore, the sample sets the property to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element beneath the element in the XML portion of a SOAP message.

value.span: 为 SOAP 消息发往和来自 XML Web 服务方法。

span.span: The for SOAP messages sent to and from an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in a service description as an operation.

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in a service description as an operation.

value.span: 与 XML Web 服务方法，该操作的形式的服务说明中定义的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in an service description as an operation.

value.span: 默认值为 XML Web 服务方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义用于包装下的参数的 XML 元素`Body`元素的 soap 请求时是。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP request when is . 这反映在表示 XML Web 服务的服务说明中方法的 XML Web 服务的 SOAP 请求的 XSD 架构中。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP request to the XML Web service method within the service description for an XML Web service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置与 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 请求中相关联的 XML 元素名称`MyCustomElement`。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP request to `MyCustomElement`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

value.span: 与 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值为的 WebServiceNameResult，其中 WebServiceName 是 XML Web 服务方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义用于包装下的参数的 XML 元素`Body`元素的 SOAP 响应时是。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP response when is . 这是表示对 XML Web 服务的服务说明中的 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应的 XSD 架构中反映出来。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP response to the XML Web service method within the XML Web service's service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置与 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应中相关联的 XML 元素名称`MyCustomResponseElement`。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP response to `MyCustomResponseElement`. summary.span: Gets or sets the parameter formatting for an XML Web service method within the XML portion of a SOAP message.

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter formatting for an XML Web service method within the XML portion of a SOAP message.
The for the XML Web service method.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义的格式设置参数的两个方法：和。The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two methods for formatting parameters: and . SOAP 规范第 5 节中所述格式设置参数使用 SOAP 编码，是指。 refers to formatting parameters using SOAP encoding, as outlined in the SOAP specification in section 5. 是指设置预定义的 XSD 架构使用每个参数的参数的格式。 refers to formatting the parameters using a pre-defined XSD schema for each parameter. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅[自定义 SOAP 消息格式设置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例指定`Document` / `Encoded` SOAP 消息必须发送到`PlaceOrder`XML Web 服务方法。The following code example specifies that `Document` / `Encoded` SOAP messages must be sent to the `PlaceOrder` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
